DOC.brief_summary: This extension study of was designed to evaluate the long-term safety, tolerability, and efficacy of fingolimod (FTY720) in patients with multiple sclerosis. The Extension study was an extension to the 24-month Core study (CFTY720D2301/NCT00289978).
DOC.brief_title: Long-term Efficacy and Safety of Fingolimod (FTY720) in Patients With Relapsing-remitting Multiple Sclerosis
DOC.criteria: Patients should complete the 24 month core study Patients with other chronic disease of the immune system, malignancies, acute pulmonary disease, cardiac failure, etc. Pregnant or nursing women Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply.
